channel.title: Quick response
channel.description: How can I change my background and turn on the fire for the torches? I use to be able to just change an image for it to work? How can I change the look of the inventory, and chat box? How can I change icons for the inventory? How can I change the spot where you X out of the game? How can I change the outline of the mini-map? (the lizards or whatever) How can I get rid of the little run box, hp box, and prayer box on the outline of the mini-map?

item.title: Quick response
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

All this is in your cache -> Spritesâ€¦ just delete the images or replace with the one u want and make sure name of the image is the same
